entry.title: Jekyll and Github Actions
entry.content: Here’s to hoping this posts and everything is figured out. All I wanted to do was move to a GitHub Actions based Jekyll deployment so I could use additional plugins and such. It has been a journey. I need to write it up at some point.
entry.summary: Here’s to hoping this posts and everything is figured out. All I wanted to do was move to a GitHub Actions based Jekyll deployment so I could use additional plugins and such. It has been a journey. I need to write it up at some point.

entry.title: A New Site
entry.content:
Starting with a new github hosted page. I am going to start updating it with more information on my personal projects, a resume, and maybe some information about things that interest me.

Watch this space for more coming soon!
